author: hwright
msg: Catch a python exception to running tests to ensure we don't kill the entire
testing process.  (This particular exception crops up if we have trouble
(_run_py_test): Catch a thrown SVNProcessTerminatedBySignal exception when
running the tests, and mark that suite as failed.

author: kimballa
msg: SQOOP-308. Generated Avro Schema cannot handle nullable fields.

author: amc
msg: TS-903 IPv6 upgrade and cleanup of resolver code.
